page.title: 18ACTIVITIES IN E.ALLINGTON
page.content: 36% of farmers seem to go on holiday once a year; 13% go twice a year; 28% never go on holiday and 23% sometimes have a holiday. About 90% of farmers don't have a regular day off.9% do have a regular day off; 1% have half a day off. We found that farmers had a variety of interests, these include some ball sports, which are football, table tennis, golf and cricket. Other out door activites are hunting, horse riding, shooting, swimming and folk dancing. Less energetic activities include piano playing, reading, spinning and gardening. Other people like to watch television. We found out that it was mainly the women that like to garden, where as it was the men that liked the ball sports. We found that the farmers that took holidays mostly went abroad.
